core

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing information to do with nodes/vertexes on the weighted graph.
    Author:
    Jacob Pennington

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arcList

      Vertex(java.lang.String id, double lat, double lon)

      A constructor for creating a vertex with a list of connected arcs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(java.lang.String id,
              double lat,
              double lon)
        A constructor for creating a vertex without a list of connected arcs.
        Parameters:
        id - - The ID of the vertex.
        lat - - The latitude of the point.
        lon - - The longitude of the point.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(java.lang.String id,
              double lat,
              double lon,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arcList)
        A constructor for creating a vertex with a list of connected arcs.
        Parameters:
        id - - The ID of the vertex.
        lat - - The latitude of the point.
        lon - - The longitude of the point.
        arcList - - A list of IDs of all ways connected to the arc.
